name: Not a Prank
detailed_description:
Fucking Clowns!


Not this shit again!
I thought we are done with fucking clowns running through dark alleys and parking lots and scaring the crap out of people.

Well...
This time something is different...

They are fucking REAL!

What are you gonna do?

  • Play 3 different game modes to keep things interesting
  • Get hunted by an army of murder clowns
  • Shoot the clowns in the faces
  • Shoot the clowns in the balls
  • Shoot the clowns whereever it hurts
  • Throw knifes, granates, etc in order to survive
  • Smash in clown skulls with a baseball bat - admit it - this shit sounds awesome!
  • Beat the highscore
  • Beat the shit out of clowns
  • Get your well deserved revenge on the scary motherfuckers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX600
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 700 series
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

content_descriptors.notes: Clowns trying to kill you in a dark and foggy environment while you are trying to kill them.
